title: Consider the Source
text: When evaluating an image, consider where it originated. Is the source reputable and trustworthy?

title: Contextual Understanding
text: Think about the context in which the image is used. Does it align with the information provided?

title: Image Relevance
text: Identify if the image is relevant to the topic or subject matter being discussed.

title: Evaluate the Image Source
text: To establish the credibility of an image, evaluate the source from which it originates. This helps determine its reliability.
choices: Find an Image with an online search
